text:
Hello,

Is it possible to send a data:image/png;base64,

Inside a form as a email?

So I make a image from a canvas and want to include this in my form so I put a image source (multi text field) and add in there as default value. but when i click send I get an error on the field. is there a limit of how long a multi text can be?

dat data:image code is very big.
Anyone know when this is official for use on enterprise?

Does anyone know if it's even possible to display a property under the list of phone numbers when you click on call in a Custom object? I'd have assumed that setting up a property as type= phone number would have been enough but that did not so the trick. Any ideas, code or no code
ideas are welcome.

In the image below you see only the associated contact and company phone numbers but not the Location's phone number
I think you can setup fallback values for CSS variables, might be helpful in this case
Aha. I see the issue now thx!
I've been perplexed by HubSpot's CSS & JS minification from time to time– good to know about this
Hello everybody :wave:, new here. Probably will be asking a lot
Does anyone knows if its possible to create custom activity buttons on the contact page?. I need to call an external function from a custom button.

We were having trouble getting CMS Hub anchor links to work, because the script that causes the page to scroll to the top on pageload, was overriding them. I added a script to the global footer that checks if the URL contains a hash anchor and counteracts the scroll to the top behavior with a scroll to the anchor.
 Does anyone know if there was a better way to handle this issue?

Can anyone assist me with setting up my local dev environment? Im trying to fetch a directory of our modules but im getting this error:
The request for "*_path name _*" in account _account number id here_ was bad. The account ID provided (account id here) isn't valid. Make sure that account has installed your app before making this call.
I kind of have that same question as well, I'll let you know if I find anything
you can do this if that's an option for you: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/crm-extensions/crm-extensions-overview>
Thanks. I need to add a custom provider to make phone calls. But cant load it as I'm embedding HubSpot on twilio flex, but this disables the call feature.
Seems like a good option, but there is a lot I need to read yet.
My main issue is CORS issues when embedding HubSpot onto Twilio Flex.
yhea Im having a similar-ish issue

To my knowledge, there isn’t any sort of universal script that jumps to the top of the page on load — that’s something that’s going to be specific to your theme or implementation. I would suggest editing your theme files to disable or remove the script.
